CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Status__c) = 'Approved', IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/confirm16.png', 'Yes:', 20, 20) + 'LETS GO', IF( TEXT(SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Status__c) = 'In Review', IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/warning24.png','No:',20,20)+ 'Approval Pending', IMAGE('/img/msg_icons/error16.png','No:',20,20)+ 'Submit Quote for Approvals' ) )
CustomField.label: Primary Quote Status
